meanings.definition: To make a solemn declaration or affirmation
meanings.sent1: He swears to always tell the truth.
meanings.sent2: She swears by her loyalty to her friends.
meanings.sent3: The boy swears to protect his little sister from any harm.
meanings.sent4: The old man swears on his honor to keep the secret.
meanings.sent5: The knight swears to defend the kingdom with his life.

meanings.definition: To use profane language or curse words
meanings.sent1: He never swears in front of his grandmother.
meanings.sent2: She swears when she gets frustrated with her computer.
meanings.sent3: The parrot learned to swear from listening to the sailors.
meanings.sent4: The comedian swears for shock value in his stand-up routine.
meanings.sent5: The angry driver swears loudly at the traffic jam.
